name: CopyProof Website
author: Tawhidur Rahman Dear

sections.description:
Protect articles, news, blogs, or text content from thieves

Some people don’t share via share tool. They copy text, and re-use using own name. This Plugin makes the process tough for ordinary thieves to copy text from the site. If you want to protect your website’s text content from theft, it’s the best plugin for you.

Who can use?

Anyone! You can use it any WordPress website. But this Plugin is helpful especially for News site or Article based site, who want to minimize content theft.

Live Preview

https://store.devilhunter.net/wordpress-plugin/copyproof

This specific page is designed as copy-protected, that you can test live

Why special?

  • 100% Free
  • Search Engines can read website

Looking for advanced solution? Buy Pro with advanced features

  • Text drag and drop will not be possible
  • Image drag and drop will not be possible
  • Image download by clicking right button is impossible
  • If anyone takes screenshot, will get 72 dpi, not 300 dpi
  • Disables Ctrl+s to save web-page as local file
  • Disables Ctrl+u and F12 to see the source code
  • Disables keys Ctrl+a, Ctrl+x and Ctrl+v
  • Disables Print Command by Ctrl+p
  • Disables Ctrl + c button in keyboard to copy anything, even Ctrl+f
  • Disables On-Screen keyboard for copy command
  • Disables right click for copy command (but URL will not be blocked)
  • AdSense friendly
  • Anyone can type in form, or command something by clicking on any command button
  • It does not have have any negative effect for website speed
  • No Pop-up message or notification, works from background
  • Search Engines can read website
  • The Plugin covers 99.99% guarantee. It ensures more protection than any other Plugin of the WordPress history
  • No coding knowledge required, No short-code required, No settings required! Only Plugin activation will make home page, page, post, product page copyprooof. Everything!

Price is Affordable, Buy from trusted marketplace Envato CodeCanyon

󠀠󠀠󠀠󠀠

Thank you

Tawhidur Rahman Dear

  • Dear IT Solution : IT Consultancy, Web and App Development, AdSense, SEO, Graphic Design, Password Recovery and Security, Online Marketing, Corporate Services
  • Dear Store : WordPress Plugin, JavaScript, CSS Code, Blogger Theme, Desktop Software for Windows
  • Dear Apps Corner : More than 75 Android Apps to make your life beautiful
sections.installation:
Download this free WordPress.org Plugin, and

Step 1. Open your WordPress Admin Dashboard, click “Add New” in Plugins section
Step 2. Click on “Upload Plugin”
Step 3. Select the downloaded package, now click on “Install Now”
Step 4. Click on “Activate Plugin” to activate the Plugin

Done! You have successfully installed the WordPress Plugin. Now see the output in website live in browser.
